Description: It is recommended not to use the default key to avoid encrypting disparate sets of data with the same key. Each application should have its own customer-managed KMS key.
Risk: It is recommended not to use the default key to avoid encrypting disparate sets of data with the same key. Each application should have its own customer-managed KMS key.

Recommendation.Text: Ideally all services should be using its own unique customer-managed KMS key
